responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "44AA972B4B23D4FBF5958898168D8E13", "Undead in the eastern riverlands? Yeah, I\'ve heard. They\'re said to appear only at night, especially on the old Baneswood road, east of Lionhold. Some even talk about seeing them west of the Trinnin River bridge. It\'s all part of that cursed plague, I\'m convinced. Now can you give me some space?")
name: DD_RVR_Lionhold_Villager04_6_Response
